Sentencas: In this work the deposition of a thin YSZ electrolyte layer (< 10 mu m) on a porous anode substrate is performed by sputtering Zr-Y metallic targets in argon-oxygen reactive gas mixtures under unstable deposition conditions.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test

Sentencas: A plasma emission monitoring system is used to ensure a high deposition rate of the ceramic film.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test

Sentencas: The deposition parameters are optimised in order to obtain a good compromise between quality, density and deposition rate for coatings realised under unstable conditions.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test

Sentencas: After a short description of the experimental setup, the characterisation of the YSZ coatings is performed using scanning electron microscopy, X-ray diffraction and permeability measurements.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test

Sentencas: Then a complete cell incorporating a thin YSZ electrolyte layer (6.2 +/- 0.3 mu m thick) obtained by magnetron sputtering is manufactured and tested.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test

Sentencas: This single planar solid oxide fuel cell exhibits a power density of 560 mW cm(-2) under a voltage of 0.7 V at 800 degrees C and a maximal power density of 660 mW cm(-2) is reached.
Titulo: Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Electrolyte Deposited by Reactive Magnetron Sputtering and Cell Test
